description: New Address Model, AMQP Improvements and a lot more

issues.title: Create Address Journal Record Type
Add new configuration schema that includes first class Address elements
Implement "anycast" routing in Artemis PostOffice
Add new management methods to include new first class addresses
Update Examples to use new configuration
Update core client wireformat to support new addressing scheme
Update MQTT& STOMP  to check that addresses are multicast
Update Tests
Create a Configv1 to Configv2 transformation tool
Define XSD for new configuration
Store Address Data and AutoCreate Address on Queue Load/Create

Remove JMS stuff from code-base
Update various protocols to deal with new addressing scheme
Update CLI
Implement new security roles for addresses
Support address prefixing
Add new address-settings to deal with new config options
Add examples from qpid JMS

MQTT Tests log error checking DLQ
replication fails with colocated topologies

Fix OpenWire policy=Block

Use Proper disk alignment over libaio instead of 512 hard coded.

role does not default to amq as the documentation states.
